report.title: Get squares list for square and user administration.
report.description: Get a list of squares for display on the square and user maintenance page, or post code query pages.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false --Get the vice country for the square as it is included in the name label, this is stored in a custom attribute as it is faster than insecting on the fly. LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# AND lav.deleted=false WHERE 1=1 AND #website_filter# AND (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id# OR l.location_type_id=#additional_square_type_id#) AND l.deleted=false #filters# GROUP BY l.id, lav.text_value

param.name: core_square_type_id
param.description: Core square location type id. We need to inclde this because if the user elects to show all squares we don't actually return all locations types

param.name: additional_square_type_id
param.description: Additional square location type id. We need to inclde this because if the user elects to show all squares we don't actually return all locations types

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.

param.name: post_code_geom
param.description: Post code geometry, so we only show squares closest to the user.

param.name: distance_from_post_code
param.description: The distance to return items from the specified post code.

param.name: pss_mode
param.display: Is the page running on the NPMS (PSS) system rather than splash.

column.name: name
column.sql: case when #pss_mode#=0 then '' || l.centroid_sref || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') || '' else '' || l.centroid_sref || '' end
